npc_output: It's hot in the afternoon, not the best time to be outside.

player_input: I'm bored, what can I do?
npc_output: You could try fishing or cooking, I've heard those are interesting activities.|r1|
I could use some assistance with preparing the festive banquet after sunset.|r1|
It's been a bit cloudy, but I'm looking forward to delivering the punctual scroll before sunset.|r1|

player_input: Want to go for a walk?
npc_output: I'd love to, but I have to steal the shadowy loot in the alley first.|r1|
I've been studying herbalism, maybe I can grow the healing plant during spring.|r1|

player_input: Do you have any fun plans?
npc_output: I'm going to entertain the cheerful prank after joke, want to join me?|r1|
I could use some help stealing the cunning hideout in the alley.|r1|
I have to deliver the punctual letter at dawn, wish me luck!|r1|
